name: Balance Board (Nichola Humphreys)
description:
Collect and match colours in each each, but watch out for the out of control playing board that makes collecting colours much harder!

'Balance Board' is a independent submission made for the 'GMTK Game Jam 2020' made with in 48  hours, using Unity 2019.

Controls:

Movement = Arrow Keys

Scene Change (when level complete)= Space Bar
